channel.title: Arham 4
channel.description:
Is a perfect example of an asshole
His signature talks shit about another member of the forums, even though it shows he made was being an asshole, then when the other forum member made a spelling mistake he wrote "grammer much?" or of some other sort in his signature when when grammer is spelled grammar.
I hope this does not get locked because this is related to the subject I am about to discuss. Why cant the people of MSCP not be such assholes to each other? its like a little ball of hate most of the time and way to much drama. I'm just wondering, why cant you all get along? Discuss why or why not and give reasons, and I don't want to here bull shit like "BECAUSE THEY'RE FUCKTARDS", or of the like.
(I also know I basically hated on that member as well, but I was giving an example.)
Discuss.

item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

I’m going to go ahead and close this. I feel that these topics do nothing productive, and really shouldn’t be discussed. At the very least, hop on IRC and talk to a mod if they’re available, and the issue is severe (not “hur dur i dun liek yu!!!”).
